item.title: R Shiny for beginners: annotated starter code
item.description: This week I decided to get started with the R shiny package for interactive web applications. As an absolute beginner, I want to document my learning journey in the hope that it will be useful for other first-time shiny users. This post assumes some basic familiarity with R and the tidyverse, but no prior knowledge of shiny is required. The content is digested from the official shiny tutorial which is great and definitely worth checking out for more details.
